Although, fortunately, I have not undergone any chemo treatment, I wanted some headwear, such as a beanie hat or a cap, for those days when I needed to give my hair, and myself, a respite.  This chemo hat/cap is perfect.  The material is super soft, it is exceptionally stylish, it fits my head comfortably i.e. it is not too tight or too loose fitting, so once it is on my head it stays in place. It is so snug, comfy and lightweight I quite often forget that I am wearing it. I can highly and enthusiastically recommend it. Deliver was prompt, and the packaging intact.

I did not have chemotherapy or lose my hair but I have chronic Lyme disease and my hair has been falling out and turning drastically to where the parts are starting to separate dramatically and my hair is just length and hangs there. But the hat helps keep my head a little bit warmer and covers up the scraggly, Large parts in my hair. Looks really great!  I actually ordered two more. One in the light denim and the other gray one! 类型: Size: One SizeColor: Luxury Bamboo - Denim
评论详情: Love love love I wear it to my chemo treatments

I will be starting chemo soon for breast cancer, and I haven't lost my hair yet but I will soon. So I bought this cap to start preparing for hairloss. It's a light cap, almost like a t-shirt material, and will be good for fall and spring, but too light for winter. It's very soft and flexible. It doesn't hold shape, so if you're looking for something structured this wouldn't be the choice. It is designed to fit low on the head and cover all of a bald head, unlike some hats that only come partway down the head. It fits snugly so it won't shift around even without hair to hold it in place. I like this hat and I'm sure I'll wear it once my hair is gone.
Love it.  So attractive, soft, light weight and fit is perfect.  So happy with this purchase so I’m ordering another in a different color.

评论详情: I loved this hat initially.  I only wore it a couple of times and the elastic in the back stretched out to the point that it became very loose.  I contacted the seller. Now the hat is unworkable unless I decide to take it for alterations and have new elastic inserted.  I don't think this was very good customer service.
